Title: Too many con's - keep shopping
Our Label: Video mein LINENSPA Memory Foam Mattress Topper dikhaya gaya hai, jahan user kai masle dikhata hai. Pehle, foam ke corners deform aur misshapen dikhai dete hain. Foam ka slow rebound user ko discomfort karta hai, aur har baar sote waqt badalne par majboor karta hai. Do mahine ke baad, user ko apne purchase ka regret hai, aur lagta hai woh isse wapas kar bhi nahi sakte. Aab unhe ise feko hi karna padega.
